BACK-TO-M·A·C IS DONATING $100,000 TO PLASTICS FOR CHANGE THIS EARTH MONTH 🌎♻️. We are proud to support @plasticsforchange, a trusted source of fair trade-verified recycled plastic, to help reduce plastic waste while improving local communities: 

🌎GOING BEYOND CONTAINERS🌎 
Our plastic efforts are about more than recycling or recovering used M·A·C packaging. We are proud to donate $100,000 to Plastics for Change to enable the collection of over 550,000 pounds of plastic – equivalent to 12,500,000 plastic bottles – from our planet while supporting local communities. 
 
🌎SUPPORTING COMMUNITY🌎 
The money will help support approximately 200 collectors involved in the collection of plastic for one year with essential social services including education, healthcare and nutrition to families, and empowerment of women and girls. 

Visit our website to learn more about how to get involved in #BackToMAC and our overall environmental commitments.

DON'T DRAG OUR QUEENS AND KINGS. 

From a drag queen starring as our first-ever brand spokesperson in 1994, to our current partnerships with the drag community, M·A·C has always celebrated drag as a form of makeup Artistry and self-expression. We proudly stand with our employees, Artists, friends and family members in the drag community, in the face of continued discrimination and oppression – and offer our stores as safe spaces for All Ages, All Races, All Genders to express their creativity, celebrate their individuality and be their most authentic selves.
 
You can take action in seconds and join us in our mission to support equal rights by: 
1️⃣ Purchasing a M·A·C VIVA GLAM Lipstick. We give back 100% of the selling price to local organizations championing healthy futures and equal rights for all.
2️⃣ Donating directly to our #MACVIVAGLAM grantees including @hetrickmartin and @lalgbtcenter. 

#MACVIVAGLAM
